name: Space-Capitalist!
description: Space-Capitalist! is a 3D tower defense game set on different alien planets. Play as Geoff Bozos, a multi-billionaire set on colonizing every planet in the known galaxy. In each level, the player must create their own path from the starting tile to the castle tile, and fend off multiple waves of enemies. The player must mine their own resources to build more weapons to defend their base. When damaged the player will lose Geoff's coins and will lose if they reach 0.
